column1: Business and Organizational Psychology with M.Sc. Psychology (HRDM)
column5: The IEC is collaborating with CHRIST (Deemed to be University) in Bangalore, India - offering a collaborative degree program where students obtain their M.A. in Business and Organizational Psychology with M.Sc.
